sentences.en: Alex and Mikhail were in partnership then: Mikhail handled the creative side; Alex was the financier.
sentences.cn: 亚历克斯和米哈伊尔当时是伙伴关系：米哈伊尔负责创新，亚历克斯是财务主管。

sentences.en: Aside from corporation, the most common types are proprietorship and partnership.
sentences.cn: 除了公司之外, 最普通的是独资和合伙两种形式.

sentences.en: He went / entered into partnership with his brother.
Her later career was best known for her partnership with Rudolf Nureyev.
sentences.cn: 在她职业生涯后期，最为人熟知的是和鲁道夫·努列耶夫的搭档组合。

sentences.en: I am looking forward to a long and successful partnership with him.
sentences.cn: 我期盼着能与他建立长期而有成效的合作关系。

sentences.en: It was a nifty arrangement, a perfect partnership.
sentences.cn: 这是绝妙的安排，完美的搭档。

sentences.en: It’s one of the most successful partnerships in the country.
sentences.cn: 它是该国最成功的合伙企业之一。

sentences.en: Joe promised to take me into partnership in his firm.
sentences.cn: 乔答应让我成为他公司的合伙人.

sentences.en: Last year we entered into partnership with him.
Martin has taken him into general partnership in his company.
sentences.cn: 马丁已让他成为公司的普通合伙人.

sentences.en: She worked in partnership with her sister / They worked in partnership.
sentences.cn: 她和妹妹合股经营[他们合伙经营].

sentences.en: The company has gone into partnership with Swiss Bank Corporation.
sentences.cn: 这家公司已经和瑞士银行公司建立合作关系.

sentences.en: The partnership has the advantage of pooling managerial talent.
sentences.cn: 合伙企业的优点是能够把合伙人的管理才能汇集在一起.

sentences.en: The two companies have entered into partnership for their mutual protection.
sentences.cn: 这两家公司为了他们的共同利益而合股.

sentences.en: Their partnership gelled and scriptwriting for television followed.
sentences.cn: 他们的合作关系融洽，接着又一起为电视剧写剧本。

sentences.en: To hedge around a partnership of love with control by law would be to destroy its base of trust in one another.
sentences.cn: 以法律限制来束缚爱情的结合将毁掉彼此信任的基础.

words.tran_cn: 合伙；合伙企业；[经管]合作关系；合伙契约

phrases.tran_cn: 民事伴侣关系；民事合伙
有限责任合伙公司；普通合股公司

trans.tran_cn: 伙伴关系，合伙人身份，合作关系，合营公司
trans.tran_en: the state of being a partner in business
